#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int fact[301],dp[100001][301],mod =1000000007;;

int main(){
    fact[0]=1LL;
    for(int i=1;i<=300;i++)
        fact[i]=((long long)i*fact[i-1])%mod;
    for(int i=0;i<=100000;i++)
        dp[i][1]=1LL;
    for(int j=2;j<=300;j++){
        for(int i=0;i<=100000;i++){
            dp[i][j]=dp[i][j-1];
            if(i>=j){
                dp[i][j]+=dp[i-j][j];
                if(dp[i][j]>=mod)
                    dp[i][j]-=mod;
            }
        }
    }
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int n,m;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        m-=(n*(n+1))/2;
        if(m>=0)
            printf("%lld\n",((long long)dp[m][n]*fact[n])%mod);
        else
            printf("0\n");
    }
}
